mapper.select: SELECT social_id AS socialId, user_id AS userId, social_provider AS socialProvider, social_provider_user_id AS socialProviderUserId, social_email AS socialEmail, social_access_token AS socialAccessToken, social_refresh_token AS socialRefreshToken, social_linked_at AS socialLinkedAt FROM SocialAccount WHERE social_provider = #{provider} AND social_provider_user_id = #{providerUserId}

SELECT social_id AS socialId, user_id AS userId, social_provider AS socialProvider, social_provider_user_id AS socialProviderUserId, social_email AS socialEmail, social_access_token AS socialAccessToken, social_refresh_token AS socialRefreshToken, social_linked_at AS socialLinkedAt FROM SocialAccount WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND social_provider = #{provider}
